official-title.#text:

text.#text: Commencing not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

The pilot program shall be carried out during the three-year period beginning on the date of the
			 commencement of the pilot program.

header.#text: Program on education to promote dental health in veterans

under

text.#text: The

Nothing in the program shall be deemed to alter or revise the eligibility of any veteran for dental
			 care under the laws administered by the

Signs and symptoms of commonly occurring dental issues, including caries.
Treatment options for commonly occurring dental issues.
